FINAL RESULT
50 minutes after 12 noon is the same as 70 minutes before 2 pm.
The number 78654321098 written in reverse is 89012354687.
(85%) of 200 is the same as 34 multiplied by 5.
The word MERCHANT can be spelled using all but one of the letters from the word PARCHMENT.
This sentence contains the letter \'s\' just seven times.
200 less 36 is the same as 150 plus 124.
The letter H is the same distance from the beginning of the alphabet as the letter S is from the end of the alphabet.
When it is 2.45 an upside-down clock\'s minute hand points to the left.
It is possible to make four four-letter English words from the letters AEDR.
369, 468, 567 \n the next number in the above sequence is 665.
Frank is older than Alan but younger than Barry. \n Alan is younger than Frank but older than Paul. \n There for, Paul is the youngest of four.
If you write down all the numbers from 1 to 50 \n inclusive, you would write the number 5 six times.
15 per cent of 70 is the same as 25 per cent of 42.
If I write the word LAD under the word MAN and \n the word BOY above the word MAN, the word BAD \n appears reading diagonally.
A C F H K \n The letter O should appear next in the above sequence.
CAT COT \? DOG \n The word GOT is missing from the above sequence.
18 27 34 72 53 84 28 \n Tow of the above number add up to 100 exactly.
6 May comes 14 days exactly after 22 April.
Six lions and three ostriches have a total of 30 legs \n between them.
The number 78521634819 rewritten with all its digits in ascending order is 11234567889.
In the alphabet, the letter tow before the letter four letters after the letter J is the letter M.
